row.entry: supports only the x86_64 kernel architecture.
Upgrade the operating system or select a different host.
The installed kernel version is less than the required minimum version.
Upgrade the kernel or select a different host.
The installed kernel patch is less than the required minimum patch.
Upgrade the kernel or select a different host.
The installed operating system is not RHEL or CentOS.
Install a supported operating system or select a different host.
The installed operating system release is not supported.
Upgrade the operating system or select a different host.
